product_name: Black Diamond Ultra Mountain FL Z-Pole Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Never break your stride with the packable and quick-deploying Black Diamond Ultra Mountain FL Z-Pole trekking poles. Sized for women, they offer extra stability when backpacking or cruising powder.
